English: Increases ATK by 15%.
Chinese: ATK提升15%。
German: Erhöht ANG um 15 %.

English: Increases DEF by 15%.
Chinese: DEF提升15%。
German: Erhöht VER um 15 %.

English: Increases INT by 15%.
Chinese: INT提升15%。
German: Erhöht INT um 15 %.

English: Increases SPD by 15%.
Chinese: SPD提升15%。
German: Erhöht GES um 15 %.

English: Increases ACU by 15%.
Chinese: ACU提升15%。
German: Erhöht GEN um 15 %.

English: Increases EVA by 7%.
Chinese: EVA提升15%。
German: Erhöht AWN um 7 %.

English: Increases CRT by 15%.
Chinese: CRT提升15%。
German: Erhöht KRT um 15 %.

English:
Increases damage from
Neutral skills by 15%.
Chinese: 無屬性技能造成的傷害增加15%。
German:
Erhöht den Schaden von Neutralfertigkeiten
um 15 %.

English:
Increases damage from
Fire skills by 15%.
Chinese: 火屬性技能造成的傷害增加15%。
German:
Erhöht den Schaden von Feuerfertigkeiten
um 15 %.

English:
Increases damage from
Water skills by 15%.
Chinese: 水屬性技能造成的傷害增加15%。
German:
Erhöht den Schaden von Wasserfertigkeiten
um 15 %.

English:
Increases damage from
Plant skills by 15%.
Chinese: 木屬性技能造成的傷害增加15%。
German:
Erhöht den Schaden von Pflanzenfertigkeiten
um 15 %.

English:
Increases damage from
Electric skills by 15%.
Chinese: 雷屬性技能造成的傷害增加15%。
German:
Erhöht den Schaden von Elektrofertigkeiten
um 15 %.

English:
Increases damage from
Earth skills by 15%.
Chinese: 土屬性技能造成的傷害增加15%。
German:
Erhöht den Schaden von Erdfertigkeiten
um 15 %.

English:
Increases damage from
Wind skills by 15%.
Chinese: 風屬性技能造成的傷害增加15%。
German:
Erhöht den Schaden von Windfertigkeiten
um 15 %.

English:
Increases damage from
Light skills by 15%.
Chinese: 光屬性技能造成的傷害增加15%。
German:
Erhöht den Schaden von Lichtfertigkeiten
um 15 %.

English:
Increases damage from
Dark skills by 15%.
Chinese: 闇屬性技能造成的傷害增加15%。
German:
Erhöht den Schaden von Dunkelfertigkeiten
um 15 %.

English: Prevents poison.
Chinese: 不會陷入劇毒狀態
German: Verhindert Vergiftung.

English: Prevents confusion.
Chinese: 不會陷入混亂狀態
German: Verhindert Verwirrung.

English: Prevents paralysis.
Chinese: 不會陷入麻痺狀態
German: Verhindert Lähmung.

English: Prevents sleep.
Chinese: 不會陷入睡眠狀態
German: Verhindert Schlaf.

English: Prevents stunning.
Chinese: 不會陷入暈眩狀態
German: Verhindert Betäubung.

English: Prevents dotting.
Chinese: 不會陷入液晶化狀態
German: Verhindert Verpixelung.

English: Prevents instant death.
Chinese: 不會陷入即死狀態
German: Verhindert Soforttod.

English:
10% chance of poisoning target
when attacking.
Chinese:
發動攻擊時，
有10%的機率使對方中毒。
Korean:
공격을 할 때 10%의 확률로 
대상을 맹독 상태로 만든다.
German:
10 % Chance, das Ziel bei einem Angriff zu
vergiften.

English:
10% chance of confusing target
when attacking.
Chinese:
發動攻擊時，
有10%的機率使對方混亂。
Korean:
공격을 할 때 10%의 확률로 
대상을 혼란 상태로 만든다.
German:
10 % Chance, das Ziel bei einem Angriff zu
verwirren.

English:
10% chance of paralyzing target
when attacking.
Chinese:
發動攻擊時，
有10%的機率使對方麻痺。
Korean:
공격을 할 때 10%의 확률로 
대상을 마비 상태로 만든다.
German:
10 % Chance, das Ziel bei einem Angriff zu
lähmen.

English:
10% chance of putting target to sleep
when attacking.
Chinese:
發動攻擊時，
有10%的機率使對方睡眠。
Korean:
공격을 할 때 10%의 확률로 
대상을 잠재운다.
German:
10 % Chance, das Ziel bei einem Angriff
einzuschläfern.

English:
10% chance of stunning target
when attacking.
Chinese:
發動攻擊時，
有10%的機率使對方暈眩。
Korean:
공격을 할 때 10%의 확률로 
대상을 스턴 상태로 만든다.
German:
10 % Chance, das Ziel bei einem Angriff zu
betäuben.

English:
10% chance of dotting target
when attacking.
Chinese:
發動攻擊時，
有10%的機率使對方液晶化。
Korean:
공격을 할 때 10%의 확률로 
대상을 액정화 상태로 만든다.
German:
10 % Chance, das Ziel bei einem Angriff zu
verpixeln.

English:
10% chance of instantly killing target
when attacking.
Chinese:
發動攻擊時，
有10%的機率使對方立即死亡。
Korean:
공격을 할 때 10%의 확률로 
대상을 즉사시킨다.
German:
10 % Chance, das Ziel bei einem Angriff
sofort zu töten.

English:
Increases probability of combos occurring and
continuing by 10%.
Chinese: 連擊的發生、持續機率提升10%
German:
Erhöht die Wahrscheinlichkeit, Kombos
auszuführen oder fortzusetzen, um 10 %.

English: Makes it easier to escape from battle.
Chinese: 逃脫變得更容易成功。
German: Erleichtert die Flucht aus dem Kampf.

English: Increases EXP earned in battle.
Chinese: 增加戰鬥時獲取的EXP。
German: Erhöht die in Kämpfen gewonnenen EP.

English: Increases YEN earned in battle.
Chinese: 增加戰鬥時獲取的YEN。
German: Erhöht die in Kämpfen gewonnenen Yen.

English: Increases foe drop rate for items.
Chinese: 增加敵人掉落道具的機率。
German:
Sorgt dafür, dass Gegner mehr Beute
zurücklassen.

English: Increases scan values by 10%.
Chinese: 掃描值提升10%。
German: Erhöht Scanwerte um 10 %.

English: Increases given stat boost effects by 5%.
Chinese: 狀態提升效果增加5%。
German: Erhöht bestehende Werteboni um 5 %.

English:
Decreases received stat reduction effects
by 5%.
Chinese: 狀態降低效果減少5%。
German: Reduziert bestehende Wertemalusse um 5 %.

English: Restores 6% of Max HP every turn.
Chinese: 每回合回復最大HP的6%。
German:
Stellt bei jedem Zug 6 % der maximalen TP
wieder her.

English: Restores 5% of Max SP every turn.
Chinese: 每回合回復最大SP的5%。
German:
Stellt bei jedem Zug 5 % der maximalen SP
wieder her.

English: Increases HP recovery effects by 20%.
Chinese: HP回復效果增加20%。
German: Verstärkt TP-Heilungseffekte um 20 %.

English:
Increases damage given by 20%,
but also increases damage received by 20%.
Chinese:
給予敵人的傷害增加20%，
但受到的傷害也增加20%。
Korean:
주는 대미지가 20% 증가하지만
받는 대미지도 20% 증가한다.
German:
Erhöht den verursachten aber auch den
erlittenen Schaden um 20 %.

English:
Increases ATK by 20% when
HP drops below 50%.
Chinese:
HP在50%以下時，
ATK提升25%。
Korean:
HP 50% 이하가 되었을 때
공격력이 20% 상승한다.
German:
Erhöht ANG um 20 %, wenn die TP unter 50 %
fallen.

English: Reduces physical damage received by 15%.
Chinese: 受到的物理傷害減少15%。
German:
Reduziert den erlittenen physischen Schaden
um 15 %.

English: Increases damage dealt to Royal Knights by 50%.
Chinese: 給予皇家騎士的傷害增加50%。
German:
Erhöht den Schaden gegen Royal Knights
um 50 %.

English:
Makes sure you always move first in battle.
(Only affects the caster.)
Chinese:
戰鬥開始時必定能先採取行動。
（本技能只影響本人）
Korean:
배틀 시작 시 반드시 선제공격 할 수 있다.
(이 스킬은 사용자에게만 영향을 준다)
German:
Sorgt dafür, dass du im Kampf immer zuerst am
Zug bist. (Betr. nur d. ausführende Digimon.)

English:
Increases ACU and EVA by 5%,
and CRT by 10%.
Chinese: ACU和EVA提升5%，CRT提升10%。
Korean:
명중률과 회피율이 5% 상승하고
크리티컬 발생률이 10% 상승한다.
German:
Erhöht GEN und AWN um 5 % sowie 
KRT um 10 %.

English:
Increases SPD by 10%, and damage from
Fire and Light skills by 10%.
Chinese:
SPD提升10%，
火、光屬性技能造成的傷害增加10%。
Korean:
민첩이 10% 상승하고 불/빛속성 스킬로
주는 대미지가 10% 증가한다.
German:
Erhöht GES sowie den Schaden von Feuer- und
Lichtfertigkeiten um 10 %.

English:
Increases DEF by 10%, and damage from
Water and Dark skills by 10%.
Chinese:
DEF提升10%，
水、闇屬性技能造成的傷害增加10%。
Korean:
방어력이 10% 상승하고 물/어둠속성 스킬로
주는 대미지가 10% 증가한다.
German:
Erhöht VER sowie den Schaden von Wasser- 
und Dunkelfertigkeiten um 10 %.

English:
If HP is over 50% of Max HP, a fatal attack
will instead leave you with 1 HP.
Chinese:
HP在50%以上，遭受導致無法戰鬥的攻擊時，
能以HP1的狀態承受住。
Korean:
HP 50% 이상으로 전투불능이 되는 공격을
받았을 때, HP를 1 남긴다.
German:
Bei über 50 % der maximalen TP reduziert ein
andernfalls tödlicher Angriff die TP auf 1.

English: Reduces damage received by 10%.
Chinese: 受到的傷害減少10%。
German: Reduziert den erlittenen Schaden um 10 %.

English:
Cuts the rate of abnormal statuses received
by 50%.
Chinese: 陷入異常狀態的機率降低50%。
German:
Reduziert die Häufigkeit von Statusleiden
um 50 %.

English: Increases ATK, DEF, INT and SPD by 5%.
Chinese: ATK、DEF、INT、SPD提升5%。
German: Erhöht ANG, VER, INT und GES um 5 %.

English: Increases ATK and INT by 10%.
Chinese: ATK和INT提升10%。
German: Erhöht ANG und INT um 10 %.

English:
Increases damage from Fire and Wind
skills by 10%.
Chinese: 火、風屬性技能造成的傷害增加10%.
German:
Erhöht den Schaden von Feuer- und
Windfertigkeiten um 10 %.

English: Reduces SP consumed by skills by 20%.
Chinese: 使用技能時消費的SP減少20%。
German:
Reduziert den SP-Verbrauch von Fertigkeiten
um 20 %.

English:
Increases EVA and CRT by 5%,
and SPD by 10%.
Chinese: EVA和CRT提升5%，SPD提升10%。
Korean:
회피율과 크리티컬 발생률이 5% 상승하고
민첩이 10% 상승한다.
German:
Erhöht AWN und KRT um
5 % sowie GES um 10 %.

English:
Increases ATK by 50% when
HP drops below 10%.
Chinese:
HP在10%以下時，
ATK提升50%。
German:
Erhöht ANG um 50 %, wenn die TP unter 10 %
fallen.

English:
Has a 10% chance of reducing
damage received by 75%.
Chinese: 有10%的機率使受到的傷害減少75%。
German:
10 % Chance, den erlittenen Schaden um 75 %
zu reduzieren.

English:
Increases damage from attributes
with good affinity by 15%.
Chinese: 給予有利屬性的傷害增加15%
German:
Erhöht den Schaden von Attributen mit guter
Affinität um 15 %.

English: Increases INT by 50% when HP drops below 25%.
Chinese:
HP在25%以下時，
INT提升50%。
Korean:
HP 25% 이하가 되었을 때
지력이 50% 상승한다.
German:
Erhöht INT um 50 %, wenn die TP unter 25 %
fallen.

English:
Increases amount of HP and SP
received from absorption effects by 20%.
Chinese:
因HP吸收效果、SP吸收效果
回復量增加20%。
German:
Erhöht die durch Absorption erhaltene TP- und
SP-Menge um 20 %.

English:
Reduces HP by 5% of Max HP
and increases ATK by 5% every turn.
Chinese:
每回合減少最大HP的5%，
ATK提升5%。
Korean:
매 턴, 최대 HP의 5%만큼 HP가 감소하고
공격력이 5% 상승한다.
German:
Verbraucht bei jedem Zug 5 % der maximalen 
TP und erhöht gleichzeitig ANG um 5 %.

English:
Prevents Sleep, and has a 30% chance of
putting target to sleep when attacking.
Chinese:
不會陷入睡眠狀態。且在發動攻擊時，
有30%的機率使對方睡眠。
Korean:
수면에 걸리지 않는다. 또한 공격했을 때
30%의 확률로 대상을 잠재운다.
German:
Verhindert Schlaf. 30 % Chance, das Ziel bei
einem Angriff einzuschläfern.

English:
30% chance of instantly killing target when
attacking if lower than Ultimate.
Chinese:
發動攻擊時，對方若為完全體以下，
有30%的機率使對方立即死亡。
Korean:
공격했을 때 대상이 완전체 이하일 경우
30% 확률로 즉사시킨다.
German:
30 % Chance, ein Ziel unter der Ultra-Stufe
bei einem Angriff sofort zu töten.

English:
Increases damage done to targets by 15%
if they are Mega or above.
Chinese:
對方為究極體以上時，
給予的傷害增加15%。
Korean:
대상이 궁극체 이상일 때
주는 대미지가 15% 증가한다.
German:
Erhöht den Schaden gegen Ziele auf 
Mega-Stufe oder höher um 15 %.

English:
Reduces damage received from physical
attacks by 10% and converts it to SP.
Chinese:
受到物理攻擊時，
傷害減少10%並轉換為SP。
Korean:
물리공격을 받았을 때
대미지의 10%를 경감하고 SP로 변환한다.
German:
Reduziert den Schaden durch physische
Angriffe um 10 % und wandelt ihn in SP um.

English:
Increases damage from
all attribute skills by 5%.
Chinese: 全屬性技能造成的傷害增加5%。
German:
Erhöht den Schaden von Fertigkeiten aller
Attribute um 5 %

English:
Reduces damage received from magic
attacks by 10% and converts it to HP.
Chinese:
受到魔法攻擊時，
傷害減少10%並轉換為HP。
Korean:
마법공격을 받았을 때
대미지의 10%를 경감하고 HP로 변환한다.
German:
Reduziert den Schaden durch magische
Angriffe um 10 % und wandelt ihn in TP um.

English: Increases DEF and INT by 10%.
Chinese: DEF和INT提升10%。
German: Erhöht DEF und INT um 10 %.

English: Increases ATK and SPD by 10%.
Chinese: ATK和SPD提升10%。
German: Erhöht ANG und GES um 10 %.

English:
Reduces damage received from species
with bad affinity by 15%.
Chinese: 受到不利種族造成的傷害減少15%。
German:
Reduziert den durch Wesen mit schlechter
Affinität erlittenen Schaden um 15 %.

English:
Increases Light and Dark skill damage by 10%
and increases HP recovery effects by 10%.
Chinese:
光、闇屬性技能造成的傷害增加10%，
HP回復效果增加10%。
Korean:
빛/어둠속성 스킬로 받는 대미지가 10%
증가하고 HP회복 효과가 10% 증가한다.
German:
Erhöht TP-Regeneration sowie den Schaden 
von Licht- und Dunkelfertigkeiten um 10 %.

English: Restores 3% of Max HP and SP every turn.
Chinese: 每回合回復最大HP和最大SP的3%。
Korean:
매 턴, HP와 SP가
최대 3% 회복한다.
German:
Stellt bei jedem Zug 3 % der maximalen TP
und SP wieder her.

English: Increases ACU and EVA by 1%.
Chinese: ACU和EVA提升1%。
German: Erhöht GEN und AWN um 1 %.

English:
Increases SPD and EVA by 25%
when HP drops below 25%.
Chinese:
HP在25%以下時，
SPD和EVA提升25%。
Korean:
HP 25% 이하가 되었을 때
민첩과 회피율이 25% 상승한다.
German:
Erhöht GES und AWN um 25 %, wenn die TP
unter 25 % fallen.

English:
Increases damage from Water and Light skills
by 10%.
Chinese: 水、光屬性技能造成的傷害增加10%。
German:
Erhöht den Schaden von Wasser- und
Lichtfertigkeiten um 10 %.

English:
Increases amount of SP received from
absorption effects by 30%.
Chinese: SP吸收效果的回復量增加30%。
German:
Erhöht die durch Absorption erhaltene
SP-Menge um 30 %.

English:
Increases ATK by 10% and amount of HP
received from absorption effects by 30%.
Chinese: 攻擊力增加10%，HP吸收效果的回復量增加30%。
Korean:
공격력이 10% 증가하고 HP흡수 효과에 의한
회복량이 30% 증가한다.
German:
Erhöht ANG um 10 % und die durch Absorption
erhaltene TP-Menge um 30 %.

English: Increases ACU and CRT by 10%.
Chinese: 命中率與CRT發生率上升10%
German: Erhöht GEN und KRT um 10 %.

English:
Increases damage given by 30%, but also
increases damage received by 30%.
Chinese:
給予的傷害增加30%，
但受到的傷害也會增加30%。
Korean:
주는 대미지가 30% 증가하지만
받는 대미지도 30% 증가한다.
German:
Erhöht den verursachten aber auch den
erlittenen Schaden um 30 %.

English:
Increases damage from Wind and Light skills
by 10%.
Chinese: 風‧光屬性技能所給予的傷害增加10%
German:
Erhöht den Schaden von Wind- und
Lichtfertigkeiten um 10 %.

English:
Increases magic damage received by 50%, but also
increases ATK by 25%.
Chinese:
受到的魔法傷害增加50%，
但攻擊力提升25%。
Korean:
받는 마법 대미지가 50% 증가하는 대신
공격력이 25% 증가한다.
German:
Erhöht den erlittenen magischen Schaden 
um 50%, aber auch ANG um 25 %.

English:
Increases physical damage received by 20%,
but also increases INT by 13%
Chinese:
受到的物理傷害增加20%，
但AVD提昇13%。
Korean:
받는 물리 대미지가 20% 증가하는 대신
회피율이 13% 상승한다.
German:
Erhöht den erlittenen physischen Schaden
um 20 %, aber auch INT um 13 %.

English:
Increases damage from Electric and Wind
skills by 10%.
Chinese: 雷‧風屬性所給予的傷害增加10%。
German:
Erhöht den Schaden von Elektro- und
Windfertigkeiten um 10 %.

English:
Restores 5% max HP every turn, and increases
HP received from absorption effects by 20%.
Chinese:
每回合回復HP最大值的5%，
因HP吸收效果，回復量增加20%。
Korean:
매 턴, 최대 HP의 5%만큼 HP를 회복하고 
HP흡수 효과로 회복률이 20% 증가한다.
German:
Regeneriert jeden Zug 5 % der maximalen TP,
erhöht die absorbierte TP-Menge um 20 %.

English:
Reduces chance of Instant Death by 50%, and
increases CRT by 10%.
Chinese:
降低受到即死效果的機率50%，
提昇CRT發生率10%。
Korean:
즉사에 걸릴 확률을 50% 저하하고
크리티컬 발생률이 10% 상승한다.
German:
Reduziert Chance auf Soforttod um 50 %,
erhöht KRT um 10 %.

English:
Increases HP received from absorption effects
by 25%.
Chinese: 增加依照HP吸取效果的回復量25%。
German: Erhöht die absorbierte TP-Menge um 25 %.

English:
Reduces damage taken from attacks from bad
matchups by 10% and converts it to SP.
Chinese:
受到適性不利的種族攻擊時，
減輕傷害10%，變換為SP。
Korean:
불리한 종족으로부터 공격을 받았을 때
대미지의 10%를 경감하고 SP로 변환한다.
German:
Reduziert Angriffsschaden bei schlechten
Kombos um 10 % und wandelt ihn in SP um.

English: Increases ATK, DEF, INT and SPD by 10%.
Chinese:
ATK．DEF．INT．SPD
上升10%。
German: Erhöht ANG, VER, INT und GES um 10 %.

English: Increases SPD by 20%, but reduces ATK by 10%.
Chinese:
SPD上升20%。
ATK減少10%。
German: Erhöht GES um 20 %, senkt ANG um 10 %.

English: Increases ATK by 20%, but reduces SPD by 10%.
Chinese:
ATK上升20%。
SPD減少10%。
German: Erhöht ANG um 20 %, senkt GES um 10 %.

English:
Increases damage dealt by Fire, Wind, Plant
and Earth skills by 8%.
Chinese:
增加 火．風．草．土屬性技能
所給予的傷害8%。
Korean:
불/바람/풀/땅 속성 스킬로
주는 대미지가 8% 증가한다.
German:
Erhöht den Schaden von Feuer-, Wind-,
Pflanzen- und Erdfertigkeiten um 8 %.

English:
Increases damage dealt by Electric, Water,
Light and Dark skills by 8%.
Chinese:
增加 雷．水．光．闇屬性技能
所給予的傷害8%。
German:
Erhöht den Schaden von Elektro-, Wasser-,
Licht- und Dunkelfertigkeiten um 8 %.

English:
Increases ATK and INT by 10%, and increases
damage done by Light skills by 10%.
Chinese:
ATK與INT上升10%，增加光屬性技能
所給予的傷害10%。
Korean:
공격력과 지력이 10% 상승하고 빛속성 스킬로
주는 대미지가 10% 증가한다.
German:
Erhöht ANG und INT um 10 %. Erhöht den
Schaden von Lichtfertigkeiten um 10 %.

English:
Has a 5% chance to raise ATK and lower DEF by
50% when damage is received.
Chinese:
被攻擊時，5%的機率上升ATK50%
DEF減少50%。
Korean:
대미지를 받았을 때 5%의 확률로 공격력이
50% 증가하고 방어력이 50% 감소한다.
German:
Chance von 5 % auf ANG +50 % und 
VER –50 % bei erlittenem Schaden.

English:
Increases SPD and damage dealt by Wind skills
by 10%.
Chinese:
增加風屬性技能所給予的傷害，
且SPD也增加10%。
Korean:
바람속성 스킬로 주는 대미지와
민첩이 10% 증가한다.
German:
Erhöht GES und den Schaden von
Windfertigkeiten um 10 %.

English:
Increases ATK and damage dealt by Earth
skills by 10%.
Chinese:
增加土屬性技能所給予的傷害，
且ATK也增加10%。
Korean:
땅속성 스킬로 주는 대미지와
공격력이 10% 증가한다.
German:
Erhöht ANG und den Schaden von
Erdfertigkeiten um 10 %.

English: Increases damage given by 10%.
Chinese: 增加所給予的傷害10%。
German: Erhöht den verursachten Schaden um 10 %.

English: Reduces damage received by 10%.
Chinese: 減輕受到的傷害10%。
German: Reduziert den erlittenen Schaden um 10 %.

English:
Slightly increases EXP from battles, and
reduces damage taken by 5%.
Chinese:
增加在戰鬥中所得到的EXP，
減輕受到的傷害5%。
Korean:
배틀로 얻는 EXP가 조금 증가하고
받는 대미지를 5% 경감한다.
German:
Erhöht EP bei Kämpfen leicht, senkt
erlittenen Schaden um 5 %.

English:
Increases ATK and probability of combos
occurring by 8%.
Chinese: 提高ATK及連擊發生．接續的機率8%。
German:
Erhöht ANG und die Wahrscheinlichkeit,
Kombos auszuführen, um 8 %.

English:
Cuts the rate of abnormal statuses received
by 10%, and recovers 5% of HP per turn.
Chinese:
降低受到異常狀態的機率10%，
每一回合回復HP5%。
Korean:
상태이상 확률이 10% 저하하고
매 턴 HP를 5% 회복한다.
German:
Reduziert die Häufigkeit von Statusleiden
um 10 %. Regeneriert pro Zug 5 % TP.

English:
Increases damage dealt by Light and Dark
skills by 10%.
Chinese: 增加光．闇屬性技能所給予的傷害10%。
German:
Erhöht den Schaden von Licht- und
Dunkelfertigkeiten um 10 %.

English:
Increases HP from absorption effects by 25%,
and damage dealt by Dark skills by 10%.
Chinese:
依照HP吸取效果回復量25%，
增加闇屬性技能所給予的傷害10%。
Korean:
HP 흡수 효과에 따른 회복량이 25%, 어둠속성
스킬로 주는 대미지가 10% 증가한다.
German:
Erhöht absorbierte TP-Menge um 25 % sowie
den Schaden von Dunkelfertigkeiten um 10 %.

English: Increases EXP earned in battle.
Chinese: 增加在戰鬥中所獲得的EXP。
German: Erhöht die in Kämpfen gewonnenen EP.

English:
Increases both ATK and damage dealt by
Fire and Dark skills by 10%.
Chinese:
ATK上升10%，且增加火．闇屬性技能
所給予的傷害10%。
Korean:
공격력이 10% 올라가고 불/어둠속성 스킬로
주는 대미지가 10% 증가한다.
German:
Erhöht ANG und den Schaden von Feuer- und
Dunkelfertigkeiten um 10 %.

English:
Greatly decreases EVA, but also reduces
damage received by 15%.
Chinese:
EVA大幅下降，
但所受損傷減少15%。
Korean:
회피율이 크게 떨어지는 대신
받는 대미지를 15% 경감한다.
German:
Reduziert AWN erheblich, verringert aber auch
den erlittenen Schaden um 15 %.

English: Reduces SP consumed by skills by 15%.
Chinese: 技能消費SP減少15%。
German:
Reduziert den SP-Verbrauch von Fertigkeiten
um 15 %.

English:
Cuts the rate of abnormal statuses received
by 30%.
Chinese: 受到異常狀態機率減少30%。
German:
Reduziert die Häufigkeit von Statusleiden
um 30 %.

English: Raise CRT and probability of combos by 10%.
Chinese:
產生、持續連擊的機率，
與CRT發生率提昇10%。
Korean:
콤보의 발생/이어질 확률과
크리티컬 발생률을 10% 올린다.
German:
Erhöht KRT und die Wahrscheinlichkeit, 
Kombos auszuführen, um 10 %.

English:
Increases damage dealt to Royal Knights 
by 50%.
Chinese: 對皇家騎士的損傷增加50%
German:
Erhöht den Schaden gegen Royal Knights
um 50 %.

English:
Increases damage dealt by 5%, and decreases
damage received by 5%.
Chinese:
增加造成損傷5%，
減少受到損傷5%。
Korean:
주는 대미지가 5% 증가하고
받는 대미지가 5% 경감한다.
German:
Erhöht den Schaden um 5 %, reduziert
erlittenen Schaden um 5 %.

English:
Increases yen earned in battle, and ensures
successful escape from battle if possible.
Chinese:
增加戰鬥時能得到的YEN，
在能逃走的戰鬥，一定能成功逃走。
Korean:
배틀로 획득하는 YEN이 증가하고
도주 가능한 전투에서 반드시 도주에 성공한다.
German:
Erhöht die in Kämpfen gewonnenen Yen. 
Sichert Flucht aus Kämpfen, wenn möglich.

English: Nullifies received stat reduction effects.
Chinese: 無效基本狀態下降效果。
German: Negiert bestehende Wertemalusse.

English:
Ensures successful escape from any battle you
can escape from.
Chinese: 有逃脫的機會的戰鬥，絕對能逃脫成功。
Korean: 도주 가능한 전투에서 반드시 도주에 성공한다.
German:
Sichert erfolgreiche Flucht von allen
Kämpfen, bei denen man fliehen kann.

English: Significantly increases EXP earned in battle.
Chinese: 大幅的增加在戰鬥中獲得的EXP。
German: Erhöht die in Kämpfen gewonnenen EP stark.

English: Increases ATK and CRT by 10%.
Chinese: ATK跟CRT發生率上升10%。
German: Erhöht ANG und KRT um 10 %.

English:
Increases damage from Neutral skills by 20%,
but decreases all other skill damage by 10%.
Chinese:
增加無屬性技能造成的損傷20％，
但會減少其他屬性造成的損傷10％。
Korean:
무속성 스킬의 대미지가 20% 증가하지만
다른 속성 스킬의 대미지가 10% 감소한다.
German:
Neutralfertigkeiten bewirken +20 % Schaden,
andere Fertigkeiten bewirken –10 % Schaden.
